Bull Run.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the place in northeast Virginia in the US where there were two important battles in the american civil war which the Union forces lost to Confederate forces. Many men were killed or hurt in these battles.
Bull Run.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a period of time when prices rise on a financial market
Bull Run.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The stock market was on a spectacular bull run in which almost any investment paid off.
